brewery.brewery_description:
Welcome to Beer Country. Our extensive range of craft beers are all brewed right in the heart of the Hunter Valley at the renowned Hope Estate. At the helm of the operation is head brewer Matt Hogan, who has been steering production since the breweries inception back in 2014. Matt brings a winemakerâ€™s approach to brewing, mixing innovation with tradition. His productivity is only matched by his passion, punching out new crafty masterpieces continuously. At any given time, our taps are flowing with around 12 different brews, including quirky and innovative seasonal beers.

Matt and his team are bearing the fruits of their labour and the craft beer community is beginning to take notice. Hot off the back of being declared the 2016 Champion Small Brewery at the CBA Awards, Hope Brewhouse also scored a full house at the 2016 Sydney Royal Beer and Cider show, earning a gold, silver and bronze medal.

The next evolution of Hope Brewhouse is our growing can range. The first release saw our IPA, XPA, Black IPA and DIPA being canned and sent out into the wild, delighting craft enthusiasts nationwide with their flavour and character. Stay tuned, our second release is rapidly approaching!
